tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: .@StateDept is recognizing #HeroesofUSDiplomacy from our rich history. On Oct. 29 we’ll tell the stories of U.S. diplomats…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: .@StateDept is recognizing #HeroesofUSDiplomacy from our rich history. On Oct. 29 we’ll tell the stories of U.S. diplomats during World War I, as they navigated unprecedented challenges in Europe supporting U.S. citizens, soldiers, POWs & facilitating aid. go.usa.gov/xp3FN
